message: Yeah, it's no biggie. I can live with it, but just thought I should mention it. :o)
@Joltrast i have that too i am thinking they are working on something so i think they know about it
minor #bug, but I sometimes get mentions on my notification bar, but new notifications are not showing in the list straight away.

the group notification appears left of the groups button
the messages notification appears right of the messages button

happened three times already: i suddenly get a lot of mentions and start wondering why there are none in the listview and why the notification won't disappear, before realizing those are dms...

move the blue notification to the left side of the button, please. (chrome 12.0.712.0 dev, if it should be displayed otherwise)

@EisFrei "the group notification appears left of the groups button
the messages notification appears right of the messages button" Good point, I had not noticed that until you pointed it out just now.
